{"id":867801575,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1672361905,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"132 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/867801575/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"16.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def maxAreaOfIsland(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        m, n = len(grid), len(grid[0])\n        \n        def dfs(r, c):\n            if not (0 <= r < m and 0 <= c < n and grid[r][c] == 1):\n                return 0\n            grid[r][c] = 0\n            return 1 + dfs(r - 1 , c) + dfs(r + 1, c) + dfs(r, c - 1) + dfs(r, c + 1)\n\n        max_area = 0\n        for i in range(m):\n            for j in range(n):\n                if grid[i][j] == 1:\n                    max_area = max(max_area, dfs(i, j))\n        return max_area","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
